slide.title: RSS
slide.blurb: The *R*ich *S*ite *S*ummary (%RSS%) is a document format geared towards providing information digests from distributed sources. It is widely used for news syndication (e.g. Slashdot, Freshmeat, PHPBuilder).

There are several classes for creating and parsing RSS files. We will use UsefulInc's *RSSWriter* class, and then we'll parse that news feed using PEAR::XML_RSS, generating a nice looking HTML output.
